Home.name: Hello, I am Arthur BRU
Home.developerJV: Hello, I am a video game developer.
Home.developerWeb: Hello, I am a game developer.
Home.info: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Development with a specialization in video game design at Gaming Campus in my second year of G.Tech, and I am seeking an internship starting May 15th.
Home.aboutMe: Thanks to my experiences, I have been able to refine my technical skills and collaborate effectively with other fields such as the artistic or marketing field. Outside of my studies, I am passionate about basketball!
Home.MySQLDescription:
I have known and practiced MySQL for 4 years, using phpMyAdmin in particular. My experience with LUA and PHP has allowed me to make significant progress in data manipulation with MySQL.

I have primarily used two interfaces to work with databases:



- phpMyAdmin: For its ease of use, management of common tasks, and security.

- DBeaver: For its advanced features and cross-platform support.
Home.GitDescription: I started using Git in October 2023, and since then, it has become an essential tool for me. Its usefulness and speed, once the commands are mastered, make it a fantastic tool. I am comfortable with standard commands for project management.

VideoGamesProjects.helluvaRevenge:
Here is a video game created within 4 weeks; we had to handle all aspects of development and asset creation/research. The game was developed in C++ using the SFML library on a custom engine.

- Group of 6 students.
VideoGamesProjects.towerDefense:
Here is a Tower Defense game developed in 1 week with the theme of League of Legends.
- Group of 5 students.
VideoGamesProjects.platformer:
Here is a 2D platformer created in 2 weeks using an engine provided by the instructor.
- Group of 4 students.
VideoGamesProjects.bibliotheque:
In this project, we had to create our own libraries. We had 1 week to develop the following libraries: Vector, Container, Collision, and an initial version of GameObject. We also explored unit testing to test our libraries.
- Group of 3 students.
VideoGamesProjects.textuelGameConsole:
Here is the first project implemented in C++, it's a text-based, turn-based game based on the theme of One Piece. It was a project to transition from C to C++ to solidify the fundamentals; we had 1 week.
- Group of 2 students.
VideoGamesProjects.shootEmUp:
Here is the major project completed at the end of the first year within a span of 2 weeks. We collaborated with the Business department, which was responsible for promoting the game, while we focused on its development.
- Group of 6 students.
VideoGamesProjects.luaPart1: Before joining the Gaming Campus, I developed in LUA on the FiveM platform for about 4 years. This experience allowed me to acquire strong knowledge in database management and creation, and I had the opportunity to work on Linux to manage various servers. Over these 4 years, I also created the
VideoGamesProjects.luaPart2: , allowing me to share my content with the community. Today, I have stopped the Polo Leaks project as I have explored all the possibilities it offered.
VideoGamesProjects.CSharpConsole:
Game in console, a turn-based game developed in 2 weeks. We had to create an ASCII map and make it attractive. We chose the theme of One Piece, and for the combat system, we had to create 3 types of AI: Easy, Normal, and Hard. We also conducted unit tests.

- Group of 4 students.
VideoGamesProjects.UnityRL:
A game developed in 2 weeks using the Unity game engine with several features such as procedural generation, Animation Curve, Drone AI, Input Management, Coroutines, OpenProBuilder, and other Unity basics.

- Group of 2 students.
VideoGamesProjects.CustomEngine:
During my 2nd year, I had the chance to make a custom engine with Vulkan in C++. I am mainly in charge of the network part, that is to say the TCP and UDP protocols and also the integration of sound via the FMOD library. The project was over 1 month.

- Group of 8 students.

WebProjects.Celtic:
Website for a basketball association created in 2 months. We were 100% volunteers to do it.

- Personal project, we were 2 developers.
WebProjects.Eko:
Eko is an online sales website that also offers subscriptions. It was completed in 2 weeks.

- Group of 4 students
WebProjects.BAImmobilier: Website for the Bac, it was my first website created. The goal was to create a fictitious but realistic company.
WebProjects.GoudGuys:
Website for an esports association created in 1 month during an internship.

- We were 2 developers.
WebProjects.ShoppingSystem:
Here is a Payment page and a Cart inspired by the JD Sport website, created in 1 week.

- Personal project

- Payment API: Stripe & Paypal
WebProjects.React:
Website created in the first year. The goal was to take a movie API provided by the instructor and we had to create an initial catalog with filters.

- First project in React

- Project by 1 student
WebProjects.ReactPortfolio:
Portfolio developed in React JS, integrating the following libraries: Axios, i18next, Font Awesome, and emailjs-com.

The technologies used include React, HTML, and CSS.

Special attention has been paid to Search Engine Optimization (SEO) with optimization for Google Search, the use of a Sitemap, and the implementation of appropriate tags.

Chocolato.Description: I took part in a Game Jam organized by the school where I study. We had 48 hours to create a game on the theme of 'Dynamic Contrast', with 'Chocolate' as the artistic direction. I really enjoyed taking part in my first Game Jam, where I was able to learn and exchange ideas during the competition.
Chocolato.Alert: For the best experience, you need a joystick.

ShadowScholar.Description:
To validate my second year at the Gaming Campus, I did an internship where I was responsible for imagining and developing the game 'Shadow Scholar: The Ultimate College'. I was able to perfect my knowledge in C# programming and discover / improve certain features on Unity such as the Timeline tool, Cinemachine, Json Backup, Profiler, Skeleton Animation, Animator, AI Navigation and I was also able to touch on extensions such as GeNa and Autofence Builder.

- We were 2 Developers
